data.message: Hello I need help please I had a Facebook account but was closed by mistake and I want to re-activate the account again This is the e-mail account inactivated husamali93 thank you very much 😥

replies.message: No thanks I'll wait for a response from Facebook, Inc.😒😏
Sounds like identification fraud be carful out there :-)
Hey حسام ناصر. If you permanently deleted your account, you will not be able to regain access to your account. Learn more in our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/224562897555674. -Sarah
The company had to shut down my account why please help and thank you??
I was asked to enter an email the second and I ignored this but then closed my old account and I lost my friends, please help
Heyناصر. We disable Facebook accounts that violate our terms. Please visit the Help Center for more information: http://on.fb.me/1advRFV -Hailey
Yes, I went to the help center and I got a lot of information but it tells me that your email does not belong to any account what can I do?
Tell me Send us a copy of the passport or marriage contract and then we help you gave me in the emergency number for Facebook but I have not been contacted on this number
I forgot dedicated e-mail to communicate, but I have only to log on to Facebook one email Is there hope for me restore my account? Thank you and I'm sorry for my long in Conversation
